text: Gift Showemimo (born 24 May 1974) is a Nigerian former forward. She played for the Nigeria women's national football team. She was part of the team at the 1991 FIFA Women's World Cup. She also played for the Kakanfo Babes club in Nigeria. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:1991 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:Association football forwards
title: Gift Showemimo
